DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Test effect Standardized Nursing Intervention Protocol ( SNIP ) overall quality life ( QOL ) ; physical , psychological , social , spiritual well-being subscales ; functional status patient undergo allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( AHSCT ) discharge , 3 , 6 , 12 month post-hospitalization compare AHSCT patient receive usual care attention control . Secondary - Test effect SNIP-AHSCT time-to-first complication , total number complication , mortality across group patient . - Identify subgroup patient benefit SNIP-AHSCT relation sociodemographic characteristic , disease clinical factor , transplant factor . - Decompose effect SNIP-AHSCT QOL direct indirect effect . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment group . - Group 1 : Patients receive home teaching visit medical aspect self care , monitor respond sign symptoms infection , recommend exercise nutrition program , relevant literature bone marrow transplantation , diet , nutrition , variety resource 1 , 2 , 3 month hospital discharge . Patients also receive telephone-reinforcement call monthly month 4-12 , 24-hour telephone availability throughout study . Patients complete City Hope quality life questionnaires physical , psychological , social , spiritual well-being , physical functional status discharge , 3 , 6 , 12 month hospitalization . - Group 2 : Patients receive usual medical care attention discharge , 3 , 6 , 12 month hospitalization . Patients also hot-line availability throughout study .
